TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ApplicationSettingsBase extends System.Configuration.SettingsBase implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public MustInherit Class ApplicationSettingsBase Inherits SettingsBase Implements INotifyPropertyChanged
public ref class ApplicationSettingsBase abstract : System::Configuration::SettingsBase, System::ComponentModel::INotifyPropertyChanged
type ApplicationSettingsBase = class inherit SettingsBase interface INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 作为派生具体包装类以实现 Window 窗体应用程序中的应用程序设置功能的基类。

span.span: Acts as a base class for deriving concrete wrapper classes to implement the application settings feature in Window Forms applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加了以下功能类，该类用于通过基于 Web 的应用程序： adds the following functionality to the class, which is used by Web-based applications: - 能够检测到的派生，设置包装类的属性。The ability to detect attributes on a derived, settings wrapper class. 支持用于包装器类属性的声明性模型，如下文所述。 supports the declarative model used for wrapper class properties, as described later. - 更高级别的和方法。Higher-level and methods. - 可处理以确保正确性的各项设置的其他验证事件。Additional validation events that you can handle to ensure the correctness of individual settings. 在应用程序设置体系结构中，若要访问的设置属性组需要派生具体包装类从。In the application settings architecture, to access a group of settings properties you need to derive a concrete wrapper class from . 自定义包装器类以下方面：The wrapper class customizes in the following ways: - 若要访问每个设置属性，相应的强类型化公共属性添加到包装类。For every settings property to be accessed, a corresponding strongly typed public property is added to the wrapper class. 此属性具有`get`并`set`访问器为读/写应用程序设置，但仅`get`访问器的只读设置。This property has `get` and `set` accessors for read/write application settings, but only a `get` accessor for read-only settings. - 相应的特性必须应用于包装器类的公共属性，以指示是否设置应支持漫游的默认值为设置属性，如设置的作用域 （应用程序或用户） 的特征设置，设置提供程序使用，等等。Appropriated attributes must be applied to the wrapper class's public properties to indicate characteristics of the settings property, such as the setting's scope (application or user), whether the setting should support roaming, the default value for the setting, the settings provider to be used, and so on. 每个属性必须以指定使用其作用域或。Each property is required to specify its scope, using either or . 应用程序范围的设置是只读的如果默认使用。Application-scoped settings are read-only if the default is used. 类使用反射来在运行时检测这些属性。The class uses reflection to detect these attributes at run time. 大多数此类信息被传递到的设置提供程序层，负责存储、 持久性格式等。Most of this information gets passed to the settings provider layer, which is responsible for storage, persistence format, and so on. 当应用程序有多个设置的包装类时，每个类定义*设置组*。When an application has multiple settings wrapper classes, each class defines a *settings group*. 每个组具有以下特征：Each group has the following characteristics: - 一个组可以包含任意数量或类型的属性设置。A group can contain any number or type of property settings. - 如果通过修饰的包装器类未显式设置组名称，则会自动生成一个名称。If the group name is not explicitly set by the decorating the wrapper class with a , then a name is automatically generated. 默认情况下，所有基于客户端的应用程序使用来提供存储。By default, all client-based applications use the to provide storage. 如果需要替代设置提供程序，则必须使用相应修饰的包装类或属性。If an alternate settings provider is desired, then the wrapper class or property must be decorated with a corresponding . 有关使用应用程序设置的详细信息，请参阅[应用程序设置为 Windows 窗体](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms.md)。For more information about using application settings, see [Application Settings for Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将应用程序设置保持主窗体的以下属性： 位置、 大小、 背景色和标题栏文本。The following code example demonstrates the use of application settings to persist the following attributes of the main form: location, size, background color, and title bar text. 所有这些属性将保留为在单个应用程序设置属性`FormSettings`类，名为`FormLocation`， `FormSize`，`FormBackColor`和`FormText`分别。All of these attributes are persisted as single application settings properties in the `FormSettings` class, named `FormLocation`, `FormSize`, `FormBackColor` and `FormText`, respectively. 除之外的所有`FormText`并`Size`是数据绑定到其关联的窗体属性和具有默认设置的值应用使用。All except for `FormText` and `Size` are data bound to their associated form properties and have a default setting value applied using . 在窗体包含四个具有以下名称和函数的子控件：The form contains four child controls that have the following names and functions: - 名为的按钮`btnBackColor`用来显示**颜色**公共对话框。A button named `btnBackColor` used to display the **Color** common dialog box. - 名为的按钮`btnReload`习惯应用程序设置。A button named `btnReload` used to the application settings. - 名为的按钮`btnReset`习惯应用程序设置。A button named `btnReset` used to the application settings. - 名为文本框`tbStatus`用于显示有关计划的状态信息。A textbox named `tbStatus` used to display status information about the program. 请注意，在应用程序每次执行后，其他的句点字符追加到窗体的标题文本。Notice that after every execution of the application, an additional period character is appended to the title text of the form. 此代码示例需要一个具有窗体名为类`colorDialog1`，和一个控件，其名为`tbStatus`。This code example requires a Form with a class named `colorDialog1`, and a control with a named `tbStatus`. 此外，还需要三个名为的对象`btnReload`， `btnReset`，和`btnBackColor`。Additionally, it requires three objects named `btnReload`, `btnReset`, and `btnBackColor`. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

related.span: Windows 窗体的应用程序设置

span.span: Application Settings for Windows Forms

summary.span: 初始化 类的实例。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 将 类的实例初始化为其默认状态。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class to its default state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数设计为依据： 假定没有与派生的当前设置包装类相关联的组件配合。The default constructor was designed to work under the assumption that there is no component associated with the current settings wrapper class, which derives from . 创建包装器类的实例后，继承的代码将自动执行以下操作：When an instance of a wrapper class is created, inherited code will automatically perform the following actions: 1. 通过类进行反射。Reflect over the class. 2. 在包装器上的每个属性标记为与`[UserScopedSettingAttribute]`或`[ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute]`，相应创建。For each property on the wrapper marked with either `[UserScopedSettingAttribute]` or `[ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute]`, a corresponding is created. 3. 每个有一些基于可存在于包装器的属性，如默认值或设置提供程序的其他属性其属性集。Each has some of its properties set based on other attributes that are optionally present on the wrapper's properties, such as the default value or the settings provider. 4. 所有其他属性只需将放入属性包属性的类。All other attributes are simply put into an attribute bag, the property of the class. 5. 所有对象添加到由此属性的类。All objects are added to a represented by the property of the class. 然后，此集合传递给方法。This collection is then passed to the method. 步骤 3 前文所述，通过为隐含本机适用于多个属性的特性，尤其是以下： ， ，和。As implied by step 3 mentioned previously, natively works with several property attributes, specifically the following: , , and . 所有其他设置属性只被传递到相应的基础提供程序。All other settings attributes are simply passed through to the appropriate underlying provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化属性的值`settingsKey`参数。This constructor initializes the property to the value of the `settingsKey` parameter. 此属性可消除歧义设置包装类相同的应用程序域中的不同实例中。This property is useful in disambiguating different instances of the settings wrapper class in the same application domain. 有关如何在包装器类的实例化期间使用反射的信息，请参阅默认构造函数。For information about how reflection is used during the instantiation of a wrapper class, see the default constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由指定的对象`owner`参数充当此应用程序设置类的当前实例的所有者。The object specified by the `owner` parameter acts as the owner of the current instance of this applications settings class. 在包装器类派生的设置初始化期间，该所有者的站点中查询。During the initialization of the settings wrapper class derived from , the owner's site is queried for a . 如果存在，它优先使用本机设置提供程序的所有属性的包装器类，由指定。If one exists, it is used in preference to native settings provider for all the properties of the wrapper class, as specified by the . 此构造函数初始化属性的值`settingsKey`参数。This constructor initializes the property to the value of the `settingsKey` parameter. 此属性可消除歧义的同一应用程序域中的包装器类的不同实例中。This property is useful in disambiguating different instances of the wrapper class in the same application domain. 有关如何在包装器类的实例化期间使用反射的信息，请参阅默认构造函数。For information about how reflection is used during the instantiation of a wrapper class, see the default constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Context As SettingsContext
public: virtual property System::Configuration::SettingsContext ^ Context { System::Configuration::SettingsContext ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与设置组关联的应用程序设置上下文。

span.span: Gets the application settings context associated with the settings group.
A associated with the settings group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个设置包装类派生自具有与之关联的上下文。Each settings wrapper class derived from has a context associated with it. 该上下文传递到每个属性的设置提供程序来确定如何使用该属性。The context is passed to the settings provider for each property to identify how the property is used. 因此，上下文就作为提示来帮助确定如何最好地保留关联的应用程序的设置值的设置提供程序。Context therefore acts as a hint to help the settings provider determine how best to persist the associated application settings values. 与此相反，属性，来消除歧义的同一个包装类的多个实例的设置提供程序。In contrast, the property enables the settings provider to disambiguate multiple instances of the same wrapper class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性，也称为索引器，常常用在设置包装器类派生自。The property, also known as the indexer, is routinely used in the settings wrapper class derived from . 将包装类的公共属性绑定到相应的设置属性。 binds the public property of the wrapper class to the corresponding settings property. 引发多个事件，具体取决于所执行的操作： raises several events depending on the operation being performed: - 第一次检索属性，引发事件。The first time a property is retrieved, the event is raised. - 当设置属性时，引发事件。When a property is set, the event is raised. 如果处理程序不会取消事件，则设置的属性值和引发事件。If the handler does not cancel the event, then the property value is set and the event is raised.

exception.span: 没有与当前包装关联的属性，或者未能找到指定的属性。

span.span: There are no properties associated with the current wrapper or the specified property could not be found.
An attempt was made to set a read-only property.

exception.span: 在设置操作期间，所提供值的类型与设置属性不兼容。

span.span: The value supplied is of a type incompatible with the settings property, during a set operation.
The configuration file could not be parsed.

A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As SettingsPropertyCollection

summary.span: 获取包装中的设置属性的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of settings properties in the wrapper.

value.span: 一个 ，包含当前包装中使用的所有 对象。

span.span: A containing all the objects used in the current wrapper.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `get`访问器的属性设置包装类，该类派生自的元数据反映，可以动态确定的一组可用的应用程序设置属性。The `get` accessor of the property reflects over the metadata of the settings wrapper class, which is derived from , to dynamically determine the set of available application settings properties. 类本身就可以识别的应用程序设置，例如其名称、 属性类型、 设置提供程序、 默认值的某些特征读取仅有状态和序列化首选项。The class natively recognizes certain characteristics of an application setting, such as its name, property type, settings provider, default value, read only status, and a serialization preference. 这些特征镜像中的属性作为类。These characteristics are mirrored as properties in the class. 设置属性的所有其他属性只被传递到其关联的设置提供程序。All other attributes of the settings property are just passed through to its associated settings provider.

exception.span: 未能找到关联的设置提供程序，或者其实例化失败。

span.span: The associated settings provider could not be found or its instantiation failed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PropertyChanged As PropertyChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 发生在更改应用程序设置属性的值之后。

span.span: Occurs after the value of an application settings property is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改运行设置属性时引发事件`set`访问器方法，或调用时，会恢复每个属性或方法。The event is raised when a settings property is changed through the `set` accessor of the method, or for every property that is restored when a call is made to the or methods. 没有对应的`PropertyChanging`事件，此类; 相反，请参阅事件。There is no corresponding `PropertyChanging` event for this class; instead, see the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定使用何种设置提供程序设置包装类或单个设置属性。The determines what setting provider is used by a settings wrapper class or an individual setting property. 如果未指定此属性，客户端应用程序将使用。If this attribute is not specified, a client application will use the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reload() cil managed

summary.span: 从永久存储刷新应用程序设置属性值。

span.span: Refreshes the application settings property values from persistent storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将清除当前缓存的属性值，随后进行访问时从持久性存储区中导致重新加载这些值。The method clears the currently cached property values, causing a reload of these values from persistent storage when they are subsequently accessed. 此方法执行以下操作：This method performs the following actions: - 它通过清除由表示该集合会清除当前已缓存的属性属性。It clears the currently cached properties by clearing the collection represented by the property. - 它会发出事件的每个成员集合。It raises the event for every member of the collection. 与形成对比在于，前者将加载最后一组已保存应用程序设置值，而后者将加载保存的默认值。 contrasts with in that the former will load the last set of saved application settings values, whereas the latter will load the saved default values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的正文中调用名为的按钮的事件处理程序`btnReload`。The following code example shows the method being invoked in the body of the event handler for a button named `btnReload`. 此调用后，应用程序设置的当前存储的值被重新加载到其对应的属性。As a result of this call, the currently stored values for the application settings are reloaded into their corresponding properties. 完整的代码示例所示类概述。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#6)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 将保持的应用程序设置值还原为其对应的默认属性。

span.span: Restores the persisted application settings values to their corresponding default properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将通过还原每个应用程序设置的当前保留的值将覆盖用户范围的设置属性。The method overwrites the user-scoped settings properties by restoring the currently persisted value of each application settings. 此方法执行以下操作：This method performs the following actions: - 它将调用上支持此可选方法每个设置提供程序的方法。It calls the method on every settings provider that supports this optional method. - 它将调用方法来强制刷新设置属性值。It calls the method to force a refresh of the settings property values. 与形成对比在于，前者将加载最后一组已保存应用程序设置值，而后者将加载保存的默认值。 contrasts with in that the former will load the last set of saved application settings values, whereas the latter will load the saved default values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的正文中调用名为的按钮的事件处理程序`btnReset`。The following code example shows the method being invoked in the body of the event handler for a button named `btnReset`. 此调用后，应用程序设置的存储的默认值被重新加载到其对应的属性。As a result of this call, the stored default values for the application settings are reloaded into their corresponding properties. 完整的代码示例所示类概述。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#5)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

span.span: The configuration file could not be parsed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Save() cil managed

summary.span: 存储应用程序设置属性的当前值。

span.span: Stores the current values of the application settings properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将每个设置属性的当前值写入到其关联的数据存储区。The method writes the current value of each settings property to its associated data store. 对于每个属性，此方法的调用上关联的设置提供程序的方法。For each property, this method calls the method on the associated settings provider. 此方法从基类实现不同之处在于，它会发出事件之前写入值。This method differs from the base class implementation in that it raises the event before the values are written. 如果定义的唯一设置是应用程序范围设置，将没有任何影响，并不返回任何错误，如果使用默认值调用。If the only settings defined are application-scoped settings, will have no effect and return no error if called with the default . 仅将保存用户范围的设置。 only saves user-scoped settings. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于在包装器类初始化期间自动加载应用程序设置的值没有相应负载方法。There is no corresponding Load method because the values of application settings are automatically loaded during wrapper class initialization. 与此相反，这些值将不会自动保存应用程序结束时。In contrast, these values are not automatically saved when an application ends. 因此，必须显式调用方法来保持应用程序设置的当前值。Therefore, you must explicitly call the method to persist the current values of the application settings. 通常在执行此操作事件处理程序的主或包含。This is typically performed in the event handler of the primary or containing . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法从调用主窗体的事件处理程序。The following code example shows the method being called from the event handler for the primary form. 此方法还追加到与窗体的相关联的设置属性的一个额外的句点属性。This method also appends an extra period to the settings property that is associated with the form's property. 完整的代码示例所示类概述。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SettingChanging As SettingChangingEventHandler

summary.span: 发生在更改应用程序设置属性的值之前。

span.span: Occurs before the value of an application settings property is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生之前通过更改应用程序设置值属性方法。The event occurs before an application setting value property is changed through the method. 不是此事件时引发或调用方法。This event is not raised when the or methods are called. 可以通过取消事件数据类。 can be canceled through the event data class. 通常使用要处理的各项设置属性的即时验证事件。You typically use the event to handle immediate validation of an individual settings property. 有关验证的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 验证应用程序设置](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-validate-application-settings.md)。For more information about validation, see [How to: Validate Application Settings](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-validate-application-settings.md). 没有对应的`SettingChanged`事件，此类; 相反，请参阅事件。There is no corresponding `SettingChanged` event for this class; instead, see the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示类型的对象的事件处理程序`FormSettings`，它一个包装类派生自。The following code example shows the event handler for object of type `FormSettings`, which is a wrapper class derived from . 该处理程序将事件信息显示在文本框中名为`tbStatus`。The handler displays the event information in a textbox named `tbStatus`. 完整的代码示例所示类概述。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#7)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#7)]

related.span: 如何：验证应用程序设置

span.span: How to: Validate Application Settings

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SettingsKey { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SettingsKey : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序设置组的设置键。

span.span: Gets or sets the settings key for the application settings group.

value.span: 一个 ，包含当前设置组的设置键。

span.span: A containing the settings key for the current settings group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供属性以启用客户端代码特别设置提供程序，以区分同一应用程序设置类的多个实例。The property is provided to enable client code, and in particular the settings provider, to disambiguate between multiple instances of the same application settings class. 除非设置包装类旨在使用单一实例模式，可以有多个实例的单个应用程序中的相同应用程序设置类。Unless the settings wrapper class is designed using the singleton pattern, there can be multiple instances of the same application settings class in a single application. 值应根据属性值如何用于共享设置。The value of should be set according to how the property values are intended to be shared. - 如果包装器的设置属性用于在同一应用程序，然后在包装器的所有实例之间共享应具有相同的值中的所有实例。If the settings properties of the wrapper are intended to be shared across all instances of the wrapper in the same application, then should have the same value in all of the instances. 这是默认行为的类。This is the default behavior of the class. - 如果包装器的设置属性是要将每个实例，然后应具有唯一的值对于每个实例。If the settings properties of the wrapper are intended to be per instance, then should have a unique value for every instance. 版本的构造函数可以初始化到唯一的字符串。The version of the constructor enables you to initialize to a unique string. 与此相反，属性提供对设置提供程序，以使其能够以高效和有序的方式保存值的提示。In contrast, the property provides hints to the settings provider to enable it to persist values in an efficient and orderly manner. 类包含一个类似属性，可帮助标识的源事件。The class contains a similar property that helps identify the source of the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SettingsLoaded As SettingsLoadedEventHandler

summary.span: 在从存储区中检索应用程序设置之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the application settings are retrieved from storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生在初始后才`get`访问第一个配置属性使用，通常通过方法。The event occurs only after the initial `get` access of the first configuration property used, typically through the method. 后续访问使用本地缓存的设置属性的值。Subsequent accesses use values for the settings property that are cached locally. 和方法将清除所有缓存的值，因此将在后续访问属性时再次引发此事件。The and methods will clear all cached values so this event will be raised again upon subsequent property access.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SettingsSaving As SettingsSavingEventHandler

summary.span: 发生在将值保存到数据存储区中之前。

span.span: Occurs before values are saved to the data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件方法之前将存储到其关联的数据存储区的应用程序设置属性。The event is raised by the method before it stores the application settings properties to their associated data store. 关联的事件处理程序可以取消此事件。The associated event handler can cancel this event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示类型的对象的事件处理程序`FormSettings`，它一个包装类派生自。The following code example shows the event handler for object of type `FormSettings`, which is a wrapper class derived from . 该处理程序会询问用户保存当前的应用程序设置属性值。The handler queries the user to save the current application settings property values. 完整的代码示例所示类概述。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#8)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Upgrade() cil managed
abstract member Upgrade : unit -> unit override this.Upgrade : unit -> unit

summary.span: 更新应用程序设置，以反映最近安装的应用程序。

span.span: Updates application settings to reflect a more recent installation of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将执行两个操作以确保平稳过渡到新版本的应用程序：The method performs two actions to assure smooth transition to a new version of an application: - 它将通知所有通过调用升级的应用程序是否存在相应的设置提供程序及其方法，假定它们实现接口。It notifies all of the corresponding settings providers of the existence of the upgraded application through a call to their method, assuming they have implemented the interface. 如果设置包装类用来标记，则不执行此操作。This action is not performed if the settings wrapper class is marked with . - 它将重新加载所有应用程序设置的值。It reloads the values for all of the application settings. 可以重写的默认行为来实现自定义升级或合并行为。You can override the default behavior of to implement custom upgrading or merging behavior. 使用方法来检索单个值的上一版本的应用程序的设置。Use the method to retrieve individual values for a setting for the previous version of the application. 自定义升级行为的示例包括：Examples of custom upgrade behavior include: - 使用重写一个或多个以前的用户指定值的新策略默认设置或以前的默认值。Using new policy defaults that override one or more of the previous user-specified values or previous defaults. - 旧值，使其与较新范围、 不同的设置属性组中，等兼容的特殊转换。Special translation of old values to be compatible with newer ranges, a different settings property group, and so on.

span.span: The configuration file could not be parsed.
